title: Hint CEO on Direct to Consumer Flavored Water
itunes:title: Hint CEO on Direct to Consumer Flavored Water
description:
Kara Goldin, CEO of Hint, discusses the direct to consumer flavored water business and her background creating jobs and stimulating the economy.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
